mapper.select: SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSU.USE_SEQ, QSU.SMP_USE_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSU.SMP_USE_PROC) AS SMP_USE_NM, QSU.USE_SMP_VOL, QSU.USE_PPS, QSU.USE_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = QSU.USE_UID) AS USE_NM, QSU.USE_DT, QSU.STRG_PLA, QSU.SMP_USE_APR_IDX, SAI.APR_REQ_DIV, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SAI.APR_REQ_DIV) AS APR_REQ_NM, SAI.APR_REQ_UID, SAI.APR_REQ_DS, SAI.APR_REQ_IP, SAI.APR_REQ_REA, SAI.APR_UID, SAI.APR_DS, SAI.APR_IP, SAI.APR_REA, SAI.APR_YN, QSM.PITM_CD, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC, QSM.IRG_YN, QSM.INP_UNIT, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC) AS SMP_DPS_NM, QSM.ANS_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM, QS.REMAINS, QS.SUM_VOL, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SAI.APR_REQ_DIV) AS APR_REQ_NM, QPAP.ANS_NO FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN (SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS SUM_VOL, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL - SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD and QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX WHERE QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' GROUP BY QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL) QS ON QS.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_APR_INFO SAI ON QSU.PLNT_CD = SAI.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_USE_APR_IDX = SAI.APR_IDX LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QSM.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD AND QSM.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP on QPAI.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAI.ANS_IDX = QPAP.ANS_IDX WHERE QSU.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSU.SMP_USE_PROC IN ('S0280200', 'S0280400') AND SAI.APR_UID = #{aprUid} AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' ORDER BY QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX DESC, QSU.USE_SEQ DESC
